name: Ghost Hunter: Eternal
description:
Why let a little thing like death get in the way of your job: hunting ghosts? 

It seems simple enough, however if a ghost stays in the world of the living for too long, they tend to fade or go insane. All that's needed to fix that issue is a quick trip to the underworld, and in order to get back out you'll need to collect the keys to the underworld in the world of the living. Good luck, and don't die (again)!

( reccomended screen size when opening: 160 )
